title.rendered: How Much Space Do Deleted Files Take Up on My Device?

content.rendered:
Deleted files that have been moved to Dumpster will utilize the same amount of space they did when saved on your device.

You can free up valuable storage space on your device by upgrading to a premium account. Premium user files will be saved to Dumpster’s secure virtual cloud, rather than stored on your device.



Find out more about Dumpster Premium here.
